greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Odd numbers by transposing the left half of A176271, triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = A176271(n - 1 + k, k), 1 <= k <= n.
comment: Sums of rows: A051673; central terms: A214675;
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n = 1..150 of triangle, flattened
example: .     Take the first n elements of the n-th diagonal (northwest to
.     southeast) of the triangle on the left side
.     and write this as n-th row on the triangle of the right side.
program: a214661_tabl = zipWith take [1..] $ transpose $ map reverse a176271_tabl
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 25 2012
